When you log in to Monzo Business for web you‚Äôll see a light version of what‚Äôs to come. It‚Äôs basic but slick ‚Äì and still has all the essentials.

You can:

  • Make a payment to a new or recent payee
  • Export a CSV file for the past 90 days of transactions
  • See your account balance (including money in Pots üçØ)

We're adding new features soon, like:

  • Searching through transactions
  • Setting up scheduled payments
  • Downloading PDF bank statements
  • CSV files dating back further than 90 days
  • Better visibility of money in Pots (and the ability to move money between them)
  • Making batch payments

relatedArticles.question: Monzo Business for web: making payments

answer.answer:
You can now make payments online at [business.monzo.com](https://business.monzo.com) üéâ

When you start an online payment, we'll ask you to approve the payment in your mobile app. 

For security reasons, if you don‚Äôt approve the payment within 5 minutes, it'll time out and you‚Äôll have to try again üîí

We're always working to keep your account secure. Here are some of the ways we do it: 

‚Ä¢ We send a magic link to your email for logging in (it's more secure than using passwords)
‚Ä¢ We ask you to approve logins and payments in your mobile app
‚Ä¢ We automatically log you out of your online account after you've been inactive for 5 minutes
‚Ä¢ We send you an email with advice for keeping your account secure once you've logged in for the first time online

If you ever receive an unrecognised app notification asking you to confirm your login, get in touch straight away üîí
